patthana8.49:1.1: Nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso ca nanokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana8.49:2.1: Nanokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.49:3.1: Nokilesañca nanokilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.49:4.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
